<L>3438<pc>243-1<k1>DarmarAja<k2>DarmarAja<h>2
{@Dharmarāja@}<sup>2</sup>¦ = Yudhiṣṭhira: I, †159, †166, †204, †205,
350, 378, 430, 471, 530 ({%Pāṇḍuputrasya%}), 545, 552, 555,
593, 616, 627, 2270, 5043, 5067, 5747, 5771, 5881, †7206,
†7333, 7365, 7754, 7767, 7769, 7796, 7930, 8018, 8058,
8066; II, 10, 14, 22, 43, 44, 52, 95, 115, 264, 273, 278,
542, 544, 556, 558, 976, 978, 987, 991, 993, 1021, 1051,
1058, 1059, 1069, 1073, 1104, 1105, 1123, 1182, 1204,
1216, 1236, 1248, 1251, 1256, 1262, 1263 ({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}),
1279, 1284, 1296, 1297, 1315, 1326, 1327, 1337, 1422,
1603, 1612, 1621, 1630, 1633, 1658, 1680, †2008, 2180,
2217, 2350, †2364, 2372, 2377, †2400 ({%Kuntīsutaḥ%}), 2450,
2629; III, 39, 163, 356, 406, 410 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 454, 464,
467, 893, †908, †911, †913, †914, 922, †951, 968, 990,
1449, 1456, 1458, 1471, 1913 ({%Kaunteyaṃ%}), 1963, 2000,
2008, 2048, 2052, 4021, 4027, 8456, 10211, †10280, †10289,
10977, 11000, 11006, 11019, 11051, 11074, 11076, 11367,
11374 ({%°sya bhrātāraṃ%}, i.e. Bhīmasena), 11422, 11427, 11430,
11462, 11917, 11923, 12291, †12326, †12329, †12333, 12398,
12441, 12452, 12464, 12528, †12574, †12588, †12593, 12597,
12805, 13213, 14100, †14749, 14806, 14828, 14878 ({%°nive-%}
{%śanaṃ%}), 14974, 15018, 15019, 15020, 15041, 15312, 15360,
15643, 15665 ({%°purogamān%}, sc. the Pāṇḍavas), †15699,
15749, 15860; IV, 158, 645, 684, 903, 925, 1083, 1364
({%Kauravasya%}), 2175, 2275, 2324; V, †14, 45, 115, 577, †665,
†1834, 2017, 2292, 2660, 2832, 2837, 2842, 2844, 2858,
2865, 4226, 4717, 5136, 5221, 5234, 5238, 5333, 5374, 5375
({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}), 5389, 5601, 5624, 5678, 5696; VI, 697, 700,
1540, 1993 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 2034, 2233, 2326, 2417, 2472, 2540,
3284, 3426, 3511, †3776, 4242, 4776 ({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}), 4796,
4945, 5099, 5758, †5813; VII, 193, 284, 443, 451, 457,
466, 679, 710, 720, 794, 1038, 1079, 1538, 1679, 1959,
1962, 2134, 2581, 2945, 2965, 3003, 3220, 3815, 3986,
3990, 3995, 4004, 4240, 4252, 4253, 4254, 4291, 4293,
4358, 4371, 4372, 4404, 4501, 4508 ({%°purogamāḥ%}, sc. the
Pāṇḍavas), 4880, 4983 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 5001, 5099, 5102, 5103,
5122, 5126, 5148, 5150, 5154, 5155, 5649, 5651, 5858, 5868,
5876, 5877, 5889, 5997, 6372, 6853, 7003 ({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}),
7129, 7275, 7380, 7672, 8362, 8363, 8739, 8820, 8850, 8866
({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 8947, 8992, 9192, 9218; VIII, 305, 421, 427,
1120, 1125, 1174, 1191, 1198, 1199, 1232, 1260, 1689, 2159,
2204, 2281, 2287, 2328, 2363, 2659 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 2662, 2671,

2754, 2860, 2976 ({%Kaunteyaṃ%}), 3163, 3168, 3171, 3191,
3282, †3302, 3305, 3473, 3487, 3489, †3490, †3492, †3533
({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 3547, 3552, 3562, 3564, 3565, 3568, 3601, †3628,
†3833, 4028, 4489 ({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}), †4595, 4986, 5014, 5018,
5027; IX, 10, 363, 381, 451, 463, 541, 626, 639, 643, 656,
668, 677, 692, 702, 703, 764, 809, 827, 856, †899, †900,
†902, †906, †911, 916, 926 (slays Śalya), 1143, 1321, 1711,
1716, 1727, 1906, 1911, 1914, 1917, 3143, 3255, 3257, 3323,
3372, 3378, 3381, 3486, 3503, 3516, 3532, 3556; X, 543,
589 ({%Pāṇḍavaṃ%}); XI, 233, 313, 322, 325, 361, 389, 530,
635, 762, 782, 798, 824; XII, 3, 152, 200, 384, 897, 1089,
1291, 1383, 1460, 1466, †1515, 1551, 1583, 1873, 1908,
1975, 2125, †6253, 13611 (C. {%°ājaḥ%}, but read with B.
{%Dharmarājñe%}); XIII, †3693, †3698, 5574, 7723, 7739; XIV,
28, 384, 1507, 1513, 1514, 1528, 1806, 1862, 1870, 1873,
1909, 1928, 1969, 2111, 2119, 2131, 2147, 2148, 2219,
2261, 2350, 2513, 2531, 2534 (only C.; B. has {%dharmajñāya%}),
2535, 2547, 2563, 2565, 2573, 2598, 2612, 2632, 2647, 2652
({%Bharataśreṣṭhaṃ%}), 2661, 2670, 2682, 2689, 2692; XV,
7, 26, 35, 41, 153, 261, 268, 370, 387, 398, 449, 459, 702,
704 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}), 706, 709, 767, 1056, 1073; XVII, 10, 69,
74, †82, †89; XVIII, 4, 54, 80, 81 ({%Pārthe%}), 122.
